00000000
0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 00000000
          .100000000000000000000000  x 2^-128      y = 0.0
	  
1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 00000000			y=-0.0

3    f      0    0000000
0 011 1111  0 000 0000  0000 0000 0000 0000		y=0.5
.1 --> 0.1 = 1/2


3    f      8    0000000
0 011 1111  1 000 0000  0000 0000 0000 0000		y=1
.1 --> 1.0


4   0000000
0 100 0000 0  000 0000  0000 0000 0000 0000		y=2

.1 --> 2

  4   0     8   00000
0 100 0000 1   000 0000  0000 0000 0000 0000		y=4
.1 --> 4

  4   0     9   00000
0 100 0000 1   001 0000  0000 0000 0000 0000		y=4.5
+ x 2^3      .1
    	     .10010000000000000000000
	     100.100000000000000000000

.1 =     1/2
.01 =    1/4
.1000000
10.00000

101 = 5
.101	=  1/2 + 1/8 = 5/8
.110	=  1/2 + 1/4 = 3/4

.0001 = 1/16

1/5
